comment._content: Apparently there was some confusion on the referee's part in this match: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9901E1D61538E633A...

comment.author: 27217020@N00
comment._content: Looks like the caption is actually Wolgast - Murphy, I think. According to the New York Times, Tommy Murphy and Ad Wolgast fought a 20-round draw in San Francisco on Feb. 22, 1913. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A03EFDA133BE633A...

comment.author: 77721971@N00
comment._content: Another photo, probably from same Feb 1913 fight
